section.title: UI development
section.para: The primary goal of ohNet is to get you developing your Control Point application's user interface as quickly as possible.

The ohNet code provides a library of instantly accessible APIs and a robust communications stack, saving you the time you would otherwise have spent hand-crafting complex protocol-specific messages such as UPnP's SOAP messages.
You can now focus your main development efforts on producing extremely high quality user interface, providing users of your application with as seamless and enjoyable an experience as possible.
From here the development of your Control Point application is in your hands.
